parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: Duration after which the item's state is updated if no data is received from the binding. The default is 1h. The format is the same as used in the expire parameter.

parameter.name: inverted
parameter.label: Inverted
parameter.description: Optional. If false (default), the item's state is initially OFF, and changes to ON after the timeout. If true, the behavior is reversed: the initial state is ON, and it changes to OFF after the timeout.
